_source.short_desc: Virtuagym is an all-in-one fitness solution, focusing on delivering maximum efficiency and revenue to personal trainers.
_source.long_desc:
Virtuagym offers an all-in-one software solution for personal trainers combining nutrition, workout planning, billing, client management and more in one user-friendly bundle. 

With the power of Virtuagym at your fingertips, you'll also discover what it means to save time, with the software's administrative capabilities freeing up more hours to put into your clients and make more money. 

But don't just read about it, try it! Book your free demo now.
_source.target_audience: Health clubs, personal trainers, physical therapists, dietitians and other health & fitness related businesses.

media.caption: Help your members and grow your business through our customizable mobile app with your own branding, logo, and colors!
Manage your business with all the functionalities you need.
Discover a revolutionary, turnkey digital membership and engagement solution for gyms, health clubs, and fitness studios. Stay connected to your members via a personalized app!
Meet the complete software solution for your gym. Cover coaching, membership management, health tracking, and scheduling from an easy-to-use mobile app.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your client bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Whip your schedule into shape by letting Acuity do all the heavy lifting. While you help clients hit their fitness milestones, Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to smartly fill & manage your schedule. From the moment clients book, Acuity's there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments. Your day-to-day will run more smoothly, even as business gets busier?all without breaking a sweat.

related_products.short_desc: Get booked 24/7, schedule clients, send reminders, process payments, manage waivers and market your business. Starting Price: $25/mo.
related_products.features: Use our all-in-one scheduling software & app for personal trainers to manage and grow your business. Manage training sessions and memberships on any device. Stay safe with 100% contactless check-in & checkout. Advertise your virtual and in-person classes on the Vagaro Marketplace. Automate your coaching program with 24/7 booking & payments, SMS/email reminders, forms & more. Vagaro Pro is the most reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/mo, Free 1-Mo Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Online personal training software for PTs to create and track client training and nutrition programs. Start your free 30-day trial
related_products.features:
My PT Hub is an all-in-one software for personal trainers, coaches, gym owners, and nutritionists to manage their clients by creating customizable training and nutrition programs while tracking their progress and achievements. Get started with our Free 30-Day Trial.

NEW Marketing Features:
- Accelerate your business with Google Ads, all from within your My PT Hub account
- Showcase your business with MySite, your own virtual storefront

related_products.short_desc: Kick your training business into action with instant check-in, client tools, payments, virtual sessions & more.
related_products.features: Mindbody elevates your customer experience - from the moment they find your personal training business on our app to their next visit. Keep business moving with marketing automations, scheduling, payment processing, automated reminders, reporting, and more. Building your brand? Get a custom app, too. Save time and give your clients the attention they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Save time and grow your business with the #1 online platform built for coaches and gym owners. Try TrueCoach free for 14 days.
related_products.features: Save time and grow your business with the #1 online platform built for coaches and gym owners. TrueCoach is trusted by over 20,000 coaches and gym owners worldwide. Starting at just $19 per month. Try TrueCoach completely risk-free for 14 days, no credit card required, cancel any time.

related_products.short_desc: Club fitness app and training software loved by 150,000 fitness businesses. Engage your members and boost revenue with online training.
related_products.features: Trainerize is a trainer Fitness app and training software trusted by 150,000+ fitness professionals and 10,000 health clubs worldwide. Grow your business, increase revenues and boost member retention with online personal training, in-app communication, group training, and workout and nutrition tracking. Trainerize connects to the best apps on the market and allows you to better manage your training clients/members and motivate them like never before. Trainerize is Free for 30 days. Sign Up Now.

related_products.short_desc: Simple, powerful, appointment booking software for service providers and their clients. Includes online calendar and downloadable app.
related_products.features:
Simple, powerful, appointment booking tool that you and your clients will love! Use the scheduler anywhere: the app or any browser. Customers can book with ease using the Visibook app or online calendar.
Easy booking and customer tracking.
Reduce no-shows.
Individual and class scheduler.
Payments tool.
Client messaging and notes.
Simple, free set up.
Control your schedule.
Work around your personal calendar.
Less email and hassle.
Manage staff.
Multi-Platform tool.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you could ever want or need to become a successful online personal trainer and coach, all in one place.
related_products.features:
Start your PT journey with a 1 Month's Free Trial. Reach more people, save time and deliver incredible results. Your ultimate online training business starts with PT Distinction. Beautiful software to run your entire training business.
Packed with powerful features and stunningly simple to use, we've crafted PTD to make running your personal training empire a pure joy. We are trusted by thousands of Personal Trainers just like you! Check out our latest award: Top Performer on Capterra.

related_products.short_desc: Online booking, resource scheduling, lead generation, and reporting solution for your Personal Trainer businesses.
related_products.features: WellnessLiving is an all-in-one solution for your Personal Trainer business. We feature a sophisticated scheduler for all your appointments, email marketing, merchant processing, payroll, reputation management, robust reporting, rewards program, among other features. There are no pricey add-on fees to embed your schedule into your site, generate reviews, send emails/SMS notifications, rewards program, marketing automations, etc. WellnessLiving was built by our customers, for our customers!

related_products.short_desc: Client management software with payment processing, websites, billing, scheduling, automations & more.
related_products.features: Our comprehensive client management software provides everything you need to turn your passion into a successful business. With payment processing & auto-billing, digital marketing, websites, scheduling, retail, automations, client & staff apps, in-depth reporting & more, you will have all the tools required to grow, nurture & retain your clients.

related_products.short_desc: PTminder is an online business management platform designed for Personal Trainers, Studios & Boutique Gyms.
related_products.features:
Virtual Training & Business Management Software for Personal Trainers.
Manage your Personal Training business with ease. PTminder is an online platform which not only covers your Calendar Scheduling, Payments, and Client Management, but also provides Workout Planning, Nutrition Planning and Client Assessment Tools - everything you need to run your online PT business!

Designed for Personal Trainers, Studios & Boutique Gyms.

similar_products.short_desc: Meet Dayful, the fitness software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments & admin, while you focus on your workouts.
similar_products.features: Meet Dayful, the all-in-one fitness software that takes the hard work out of scheduling, payments and admin, so you have more time to focus on your workouts. Let clients easily book sessions 24/7 online or with a handy mobile app-and reduce no-shows with automated confirmations & reminders. Supercharge your fitness business with a powerful calendar, time-saving automations and features built with your clients in mind. Be the best kind of busy with Dayful.

similar_products.short_desc: A cloud-based customizable, personalized platform for coaches & trainers to keep track of athletes' progress, workouts & communications

ScienceTraining was created with a strong and clear vision: to make endurance coaching as easy as possible. This is achieved by giving coaches the tools to admin, train & monitor more athletes more effectively and in less time.

Manage your memberships, scheduling, reporting, attendance, communication, payments and more. Upper Hand is configurable to fit the unique needs of your business, and is used by fitness trainers to propel recurring revenue, optimize their operations, and improve member retention and satisfaction - enabling you to focus on delivering stronger client outcomes that grow your bottom line. Get a free demo today.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Club Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Club Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Club Management software automates management functions including membership, fees, dues and other operations for fitness, social and civic clubs or other similar organizations. These applications offer integrated solutions for access management as well as sales and marketing tools for club facilities. Club Management solutions also help track business performances through automated reporting and forecasting on sales performance, member retention rates and revenue generation. Club Management software is related to Membership Management software, Visitor Management software, and Registration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fitness software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fitness tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fitness software helps you organize your gym with client booking tools, scheduling, financial tracking, and community tools. Fitness software often includes automated billing features, point of sale, and resource reporting. Buyers looking for fitness software may also be interested in Club Management software and Personal Trainer software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nutrition Analysis software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nutrition Analysis tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nutrition Analysis software can be used in food service and food manufacturing industries to calculate nutritional values for menu items and recipes, generate nutrition and ingredient labels, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

_source.short_desc: Virtuagym is the leader in innovative, all-in-one fitness solutions. For the smallest studio to the largest chain, we have you covered.
_source.long_desc:
Virtuagym is the ultimate all-in-one solution for personal trainers and fitness businesses of all sizes looking to take their club to the next level. 

Our software offers a host of features like nutrition, workout planning, billing, client management and more in one user-friendly bundle.

You'll discover what it means to reduce administration time and, most importantly, boost your revenue.
 

Sounds interesting? Book your free demo and get ready to transform your fitness business!
_source.target_audience: Health clubs, personal trainers, physical therapists, dietitians and other health & fitness related businesses.

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Hourly Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that charges based on the amount of time spent

category_features.name: Mobile Payments
category_features.definition: Clients can submit payments via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Currency
category_features.definition: Manage and handle various international currencies

category_features.name: Online Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create, send, and view electronic invoices

category_features.name: Online Payments
category_features.definition: Payment webpage where clients can pay bills

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Project Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients an amount based on the project/task/job performed

category_features.name: Recurring/Subscription Billing
category_features.definition: Business model that bills clients repeatedly based on set amount of time

category_features.name: Tax Calculation
category_features.definition: Location based taxes

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Financial Management
category_features.definition: Provide a comprehensive overview of organization's finances

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Marketing Automation
category_features.definition: Plan, track, and evaluate marketing activities including promotions, customer outreach, and branding

category_features.name: Order Management
category_features.definition: Organize, track, monitor and execute customer orders for goods, investments, or any other purcahses

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Purchasing & Receiving
category_features.definition: Buy necessary items in compliance with established business policies

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

category_features.name: Training Management
category_features.definition: Track employee's progression through training programs

category_features.name: Vendor Management
category_features.definition: Ability to track and store all vendor-related information, such as contacts, services offered, terms, etc.

category_features.name: Address Book
category_features.definition: Stored list of contacts and groups

category_features.name: Calendar Sync
category_features.definition: Synchronize with other calendars to view mutual availability and schedules

category_features.name: Calendar/Reminder System
category_features.definition: Notifications/alerts for upcoming events or tasks

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: A way to visually represent data where different categories of items are marked with different colors

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Meet the personal scheduling assistant that works 24/7 behind the scenes to fill your calendar & take busywork off your plate. From the moment clients book with you, Acuity is there to automatically send branded & customized booking confirmations to you and your clients, deliver text reminders, let clients reschedule on their own, and process payments or accept donations. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as business get busier. All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your schedule, get booked 24/7, send automated reminders, manage memberships, securely process payments & more. Starts at $25/mo
related_products.features: Boost your productivity and free up time with Vagaro Salon, Spa & Fitness Appointment Scheduling Software. Schedule appointments from a desktop or use our App to manage clients on the go. Get booked on our marketplace, your booking page, Facebook, Yelp, Instagram or on your own website via our booking widget. Send automated reminders and emails. Securely process payments. Vagaro Pro is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/month. Sign up for a Free 1 Month Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
related_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Easily Schedule Jobs, Assign Team Members, and Set Arrival Windows in only a few clicks. Housecall Pro is an all-in-one Field Service management app that helps automate business processes and workflows. Trusted by over 25,000 home service companies.

related_products.short_desc: SimplePractice is the #1 HIPAA compliant practice management software. Join 100000+ thriving health & wellness professionals.
related_products.features:
The all-in-one practice management solution for private practitioners. Practitioners who switched to SimplePractice spent 35% less time on scheduling each week. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. Send paperless intakes and insurance forms.  Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. 
Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest.
Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify appointment scheduling and automate reminders with Mindbody scheduling software and streamline business management.
related_products.features: Mindbody business management software elevates your client experience, from "Hello" to "See you Tuesday!" Step up to seamless online booking, automated marketing, integrated payment processing, and robust reporting. Set your brand apart with a customized app and stop missing calls (and clients) with an AI-powered front desk. Turn new leads into loyal customers with integrated lead management. Save time and give clients the wow-worthy experience they deserve. Schedule your free demo today.

related_products.short_desc: Calendly is the world's #1 scheduling tool. It eliminates the hassle of back-and-forth emails and syncs with your entire team.
related_products.features: Calendly makes scheduling meetings easy and efficient, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth emails so you can get back to work. Already recognized as the intuitive scheduling leader for more than 10 million people around the world, Calendly also offers extended capabilities for teams with powerful collaboration functionality, robust administration controls, and enterprise-grade security and compliance. Integrations with Zoom, Salesforce, Google, Microsoft, Slack, & more.

related_products.short_desc: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks, like scheduling meetings, quick and easy.
related_products.features: Doodle enables busy professionals to focus on their real work by making time-consuming tasks like scheduling and organizing meetings fast and easy. The worlds leader in online scheduling, doodle.com is used by over 30 million people each month. Doodle AG is headquartered in Zurich.

related_products.short_desc: Fresha is world's leading appointment booking software and is totally subscription-free!
related_products.features: Fresha is the world's leading booking software for appointment scheduling and is totally subscription-free! Join 70,000+ businesses and 250,000 professionals who use Fresha to boost their sales in 120+ countries. Fresha is a simple, flexible and powerful booking software with all the advanced features you need to run your business. Optional paid features include integrated payment processing, deposits and no-show protection. Only pay for what you use, with zero monthly fees.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your brand from a fully-integrated singular platform. You can?t be great without integrate!
related_products.features: Enjoy the fruits of a busy schedule . When it comes to business, time is money. Scheduling allows you to maximize your time and revenue by giving you full control over your schedule, staff, services and more. Create your free account today to learn more and explore plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Online Booking System with reminders for all service companies! Let your clients book themselves online - Includes free version.

Manage your business with one solution; website, accept bookings, marketing initiatives, business statistics and,online and on site payments (POS).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Scheduling software helps businesses organize and manage personnel's schedules. Employee Scheduling solutions often show work schedules of different employees side by side to allow managers to easily match tasks to people with the appropriate skill level. This software also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and keep scheduling process up to date with the most current information. Employee Scheduling software is related to Appointment Scheduling software, Scheduling software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Scheduling software assists with patient, staff, and facilities scheduling for the medical industry. These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scheduling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scheduling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scheduling software automates the scheduling of events, employees, rooms and other resources. Organizations use these applications to manage the planning of internal and external activities. Typically Scheduling software provides tools such as a shared calendar providing real-time project, task, employee and resource scheduling as well as a variety of forecasting, allocation and resource management features. Often other details, such as resource categorization, location details, timesheet records and employee skill-sets can be edited, updated and managed from the scheduling interface. Scheduling software is related to Employee Scheduling software, Facility Management software and Appointment Scheduling software.
